summary: Just a small plug-in to craft child dolls or wooden swords.
descriptionHtml:
I hate coming back at home with nothing for my children. Most of the time I have dozen of gift on my horse (just in case!) but a carefully handcrafted gift is probably better than a common doll don\'t you think?

This mod add crafting recipe for child doll and wooden sword. Both can be crafted at a forge under the misc section using a firewood.
I know using a tanning rack to craft a wooden sword is stupid but the only other solution who came to my mind was to add a lesser power opening a menu then checking if you had the required material and so on.
What is supposed to be a tiny mod would then have been not so tiny.


Each version features a different recipe for the doll:
1.0.0 use firewood (my mistake)
1.1.0 use linen wraps and straw. More logical but you won\'t be able to buy linen wraps in town.


Install instruction:
Use your favorite mod manager.
or:
Unzip Craftable doll and wooden sword.7z
Drop Craftable doll and wooden sword.esp in your Skyrim\\Data\\ folder
Check the box for Craftable doll and wooden sword  in the DATA section of the Skyrim Launcher
author: Huillam

files.name: Craftable doll and wooden sword
files.changelogHtml:
Change: Changed components to craft children's doll from firewood to linen straps and straw (Credit goes to andiders for noticing that the doll was in fact no made from wood)
Change: Wooden sword and children's doll are now crafted at a tanning rack (at least it makes sense for the doll).
